commits.content:
{% comment %} FAQ - Fashion Store {% endcomment %}

Frequently Asked Questions

What is your return policy?

We offer easy 30-day returns on all orders.

How long does shipping take?

Standard UK shipping is 2-3 business days. Next-day options available.

Are your products ethically made?

Yes, all our products are ethically sourced and produced.
